template.p: Welcome to the Odoo Tattoo Shop package! This guide will help you manage your Tattoo shop efficiently. Manage new opportunities, consent forms, your social media presence and your bookings.
Your Odoo Tattoo Shop package includes essential apps to streamline your operations:

ul.li: Use the CRM App to manage your leads and track ongoing tattoo projects.
Handle consent forms and important documents effortlessly with the Sign App.
Showcase your work, attract new clients through the Website App.
Let your customers book and manage appointments through the Appointments App.
Share your latest creations and engage with your audience using the Social Marketing App.
Restock supplies with ease using the Purchase App.
Manage your opportunities through Activities.

div.p: If you want to easily discover every features of this package, try downloading the Demo Data.
